titles.title: CODE Act of 2019
CODE Act of 2019
CODE Act of 2019
CTE Outcome Data Enactment Act of 2019
CTE Outcome Data Enactment Act of 2019
To direct the Secretary of Education to conduct a study on Federal data collection related to student participation and performance in career and technical education programs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
CTE Outcome Data Enactment Act of 2019 or the CODE Act of 2019
This bill directs the Department of Education to report on data collection related to student participation and performance in career and technical education programs.
